participant_1.background:
My parents were divorced.
I am a widow.
I have broken my arm twice.
I grew up with 6 siblings.

participant_2.background:
I went to the university of north carolina.
I get paid over 5 million a year to dribble a ball.
I play basketball.
I was drafted last years by the minnesota wolves.
I am an athlete.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a basketball player for the Minnesota Timberwolves.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a widow.
I'm sorry to hear that.
Thanks. How many siblings do you have?
I grew up with six siblings.
Wow, that's a lot! What was it like growing up in a big family?
It was a lot of fun. We were always playing games and getting into trouble.
I bet. Do you have any favorite childhood memories?
I have a lot of favorite childhood memories, but one that stands out is when we all went camping together. We had so much fun hiking, swimming, and roasting marshmallows over the campfire.
That sounds like a great time! I love camping.
Me too! It's a great way to get away from the hustle and bustle of city life.
I agree. So, what's your favorite thing about being a basketball player?
I love the adrenaline rush of playing in front of a packed arena. It's an amazing feeling to be able to connect with fans and share my passion for the game with them.
That sounds amazing. I'm sure it's a lot of pressure, but it must be a lot of fun too.
It is. It's a lot of hard work, but it's worth it when you get to play the game you love.
I'm sure it is. So, what's your goal for the season?
My goal is to help the Timberwolves win a championship. We have a lot of talent on the team, and I think we're capable of making a deep run in the playoffs.
I'm rooting for you! I'm sure you'll do great.
